title: Justice Department's High Stakes Suit Over Abortion
itunes:title: Justice Department's High Stakes Suit Over Abortion
description:
Leah Litman, a professor at the University of Michigan Law School, discusses the Justice Department's lawsuit against the state of Texas to block the most restrictive abortion law in the country, after the Supreme Court refused to do so.

June Grasso hosts.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
